=== SRU Report -- jibel ===
Over the past week 139 packages have been published to stable releases
The complete list is available at
http://reports.qa.ubuntu.com/reports/sru/latest.html

* A total of 45 packages have been published to maverick
** 10 packages published to maverick-updates: awstats, dell-recovery, emacs23, etckeeper, fuse, pango1.0, pgdesigner, ubuntu-font-family-sources, util-linux, xdg-utils
** 12 packages published to maverick-security: chromium-browser, chromium-browser, exim4, flashplugin-nonfree, italc, krb5, openssl, qemu-kvm, shadow, squid3, vlc, wordpress
** 23 packages published to maverick-proposed: ampache, bash-completion, brasero, facter, grub-installer, inkscape, jinja2, kdeadmin, kdesudo, libdbi, linux, linux-backports-modules-2.6.35, linux-firmware, linux-meta, linux-ports-meta, munin, octave3.2, software-center, tcptrack, tzdata, universalindentgui, xkeyboard-config, xserver-xorg-video-geode
* A total of 68 packages have been published to lucid
** 28 packages published to lucid-updates: language-pack-*
** 13 packages published to lucid-security: chromium-browser, chromium-browser, drupal6, drupal6, exim4, flashplugin-nonfree, italc, krb5, openssl, qemu-kvm, shadow, vlc, wordpress
** 27 packages published to lucid-proposed: brasero, cacti, ecryptfs-utils, facter, fuse, gdm, grub-installer, kdeadmin, kdesudo, language-pack-fi, language-pack-fi-base, language-pack-oc, language-pack-oc-base, linux, linux-ec2, linux-firmware, linux-fsl-imx51, logrotate, mysql-dfsg-5.1, octave3.2, openafs, pm-utils, squid, tcptrack, tzdata, varnish, xkeyboard-config
* A total of 15 packages have been published to karmic
** 10 packages published to karmic-security: drupal5, drupal5, drupal6, drupal6, exim4, flashplugin-nonfree, italc, krb5, qemu-kvm, shadow
** 5 packages published to karmic-proposed: linux, linux-ec2, linux-fsl-imx51, twiki, tzdata
* A total of 8 packages have been published to hardy
** 4 packages published to hardy-security: drupal5, drupal5, exim4, krb5
** 4 packages published to hardy-proposed: linux, openssh, twiki, tzdata
* A total of 3 packages have been published to dapper
** 1 packages published to dapper-security: exim4
** 2 packages published to dapper-proposed: langpack-locales, linux-source-2.6.15
Thanks to all the contributors who helped with testing.
As always, you can see the current set of packages needing testing in the -proposed queue at http://people.canonical.com/~ubuntu-archive/pending-sru.html . Your assistance in testing is always appreciated!
